question: I had sensation of pulsation at the root of penis for few days and then my both legs become slightly heavy. After three days my feet became tight and had the feeling of wearing tight socks or tight shoes.Neurological; reflexes were normal. I have no diabetes, no iron deficiency, B12 level is normal.No pathology is known for this condition as per my health care people.My concern; Can this condition lead to stroke?Is massage beneficial for this condition?Is there any physiotherapy for this condition? Any suggestion will be appreciated. I am 79. Thanks
title: Can chronic tightness of feet lead to stroke?
